channel.title: Project Demented New Generation of PI
channel.description:
[center][b]Hello, Project Demented is a project that our development team is working on to make people's perspective on PI better. We will be using the base "[color=red]Caution-X Rewriting Everything basicly[/color]" We currently have 4 people on our development team. This is some media of the base that we will be using to do this project.[/b]
[URL=http://minus.com/lUE2lambCXV3R][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jUE2lambCXV3R.jpg[/img][/URL]
Development Team Alex (Main dev) Demonhorn (Secondary Dev) Damon (Client Sided)
[color=limegreen]Experience[/color] Alex - Programming Java/RSPS(317/718) for 9 months. Demonhorn - Programming Java/RSPS(317) for 1 year. Damon - Programming Java/RSPS(317) for 1+ years.
Application:
[b]Skype: Java knowledge: Latest/greatest updates you've accomplished: Dedicated? Y/N: Misc(any extra info you'd like to add):[/b]
[b] Updates. Alex's Updates So far I fixed the problem when you character goes up to the player with range or magic and attacks like melee. Made the server a Little bit more stable Fixed the Problem when the player goes up to the player While in the wilderness. Added potion emptying. Added fully working Water filling. Added Beverages Beer Vodka Whiskys Rum.Etc Added Wilderness interface. Added Amulet of Glory Added Ring Of Dualing Added Games Necklass
Demonhorn's updates [1.1.2013]
- Fixed animations for items; * Chaotic weaponry * Scimitars & longswords * Balmung - Added proper animations for; * Chaotic weaponry * Scimitars & longswords * Korasi * Balmung * More!
- Added flawless switching
- Cleaned up some classes
- Added proper block animations for; * Chaotics * Some other weapons * Defenders
Damons updates Made it so cache will load from client and repacked the client.[/center][/b]
[URL=http://minus.com/lbrCruHajuZPOo][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbrCruHajuZPOo.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lySh7bgdijGrq][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jySh7bgdijGrq.png[/img][/URL] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1yNYLFlv6RQ&feature=youtu.be]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1yNYLFlv6RQ&feature=youtu.be[/url] [URL=http://minus.com/lyKDaWO84xELF][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jyKDaWO84xELF.png[/img][/URL] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MLluVK-exbM&feature=youtu.be]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MLluVK-exbM&feature=youtu.be[/url] [URL=http://minus.com/lwz5mwjMc1WNQ][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jwz5mwjMc1WNQ.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Project Demented New Generation of PI
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

[center]Hello, Project Demented is a project that our development team is working on to make people’s perspective on PI better. We will be using the base “[color=red]Caution-X Rewriting Everything basicly[/color]” We currently have 4 people on our development team.
This is some media of the base that we will be using to do this project.

Development Team
Alex (Main dev)
Demonhorn (Secondary Dev)
Damon (Client Sided)

[color=limegreen]Experience[/color]
Alex - Programming Java/RSPS(317/718) for 9 months.
Demonhorn - Programming Java/RSPS(317) for 1 year.
Damon - Programming Java/RSPS(317) for 1+ years.

Application:

Skype:
Java knowledge:
Latest/greatest updates you’ve accomplished:
Dedicated? Y/N:
Misc(any extra info you’d like to add):

[b] Updates.
Alex’s Updates
So far I fixed the problem when you character goes up to the player with range or magic and attacks like melee.
Made the server a Little bit more stable
Fixed the Problem when the player goes up to the player While in the wilderness.
Added potion emptying.
Added fully working Water filling.
Added Beverages Beer Vodka Whiskys Rum.Etc
Added Wilderness interface.
Added Amulet of Glory
Added Ring Of Dualing
Added Games Necklass

Demonhorn’s updates
[1.1.2013]

  • Fixed animations for items;
  • Chaotic weaponry
  • Scimitars & longswords
  • Balmung
  • Added proper animations for;
  • Chaotic weaponry
  • Scimitars & longswords
  • Korasi
  • Balmung
  • More!

  • Added flawless switching

  • Cleaned up some classes

  • Added proper block animations for;

  • Chaotics
  • Some other weapons
  • Defenders

Damons updates
Made it so cache will load from client
and repacked the client.[/center][/b]
